sentences.en: Auntie and Uncle suggested she serve in the shop.
sentences.cn: 阿姨和叔叔建议她去商店工作。

sentences.en: Do not toss the salad until you're ready to serve.
sentences.cn: 到快上菜时再轻轻搅拌色拉。

sentences.en: Fitzgerald then served out for the set.
sentences.cn: 费茨杰拉德本局最后一场凭发球取胜。

sentences.en: His powerful serve was too much for the defending champion.
sentences.cn: 他的大力发球让卫冕冠军难以招架。

sentences.en: it would serve you right if Jeff walked out on you.
sentences.cn: 如果杰夫离你而去的话，那你活该。

sentences.en: Prepare the garnishes shortly before you are ready to serve the soup.
sentences.cn: 在快要准备上汤前再在上面加点装饰菜。

sentences.en: Punish him; it will serve him right for what he has done to you.
sentences.cn: 惩罚他；考虑到他对你的所做所为这样对他是他罪有应得

sentences.en: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.cn: 端离炉子，加上欧芹，颠起翻面后就立刻上桌。

sentences.en: Serve hot, with pasta or rice and French beans.
sentences.cn: 趁热和意大利面或米饭以及四季豆一起端上桌。

sentences.en: Serve straight from the dish with a tossed green salad.
sentences.cn: 配上拌过了的田园色拉直接上桌。

sentences.en: Serve the cake warm or at room temperature, cut in squares.
sentences.cn: 等蛋糕温热或凉至室温时切成四方块端上桌。

sentences.en: She served us a delicious lunch.
sentences.cn: 她招待我们吃了一顿可口的午餐。

sentences.en: Sprinkle with cheese and serve immediately.
sentences.cn: 撒上干酪立刻上桌。

sentences.en: The holes were sufficiently large to serve as nests.
sentences.cn: 这些洞作鸟巢足够大。

sentences.en: The judge recommended that he serve 20 years in prison.
sentences.cn: 法官建议判处他20年监禁。

sentences.en: The landlord refused to serve him because he considered him too drunk.
sentences.cn: 酒吧老板觉得他已经喝多了，拒绝再给他添酒。

sentences.en: The waiter was serving another table.
sentences.cn: 那名侍应生在接待另一桌客人。

sentences.en: Their action can only serve to harden the attitude of landowners.
sentences.cn: 他们的行动只会让土地拥有者的态度变得更坚定。

sentences.en: There are only 35 staff to serve 30,000-plus customers.
sentences.cn: 只有35名员工，却要为3万多顾客服务。

sentences.en: There was only one girl serving customers .
sentences.cn: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

sentences.en: There was only one girl serving customers.
sentences.cn: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

sentences.en: They were willing to serve the fatherland in its hour of need.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意在祖国需要的时候为她效力。

sentences.en: To serve, top the fish with the cooked leeks.
sentences.cn: 上菜时，把炒好的韭葱覆在鱼上。

words.tran_cn: 有用的，可供使用的；耐用的
发球员；服伺者；服勤者；伺候者
可用性，适用性；使用可靠性；[计] 可服务性；可维修性
服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候

phrases.tran_cn: 应得：在某些条件下应该
vt. 担任...的职；担当（担任）；成为...中的一员
(网球)发球赢得一局的最后一场
侍二主，听命于两个原则相左的上级
在某人部下服役，在某人麾下

trans.tran_en: the action in a game such as tennis or  volleyball  when you throw the ball in the air and hit it over the net

trans.tran_cn: 为…服务/效力，任职，可用作，提供，接待，送交，服刑，发球，对…有用，端上（食物），足够…吃/用
trans.tran_en: to help the customers in a shop, especially by bringing them the things that they want

trans.tran_cn: 服务， 供职， 服役； 伺候， 招待， 接待； 有用， 用作， 起…作用， 适合； 发球
trans.tran_en: to help the customers in a shop, especially by bringing them the things that they want

trans.tran_cn: 为…服务；任；接待；为…端上；符合，适用于，满足；供应；度过；发
trans.tran_en: to help the customers in a shop, especially by bringing them the things that they want
